verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Adam where are you
I came to walk with you
And found an empty place
Where face to face
We used to talk
Adam I love you
And I will find a way
Wo bring you back someday
To where we first began
Adam where are you
Adam where are you

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I gave you sight and breath
The choice of life or death
And put within your heart
The yearning to belong
But all along I knew
The choice was up to you
To give me all your heart
Or lose your song

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I came when ev'ning fell
To where we knew so well
To hear your laughter echo down
The well worn lane
But there was no one there
Just silence ev'rywhere
The forests seemed to sense
A Father's pain

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Adam where are you
Adam where are you
Adam where are you
My child where are you
